name: Penny for your Thoughts (itch)
description:
You are a mind reader.

People come to you with questions about the thoughts of others- and your job is to answer them.

The people who seek your advice will do different things based on what you tell them. You must decide what is more important- the truth, or what you do with it.

This is my first visual novel, so feedback is always appreciated. Thank you for playing!
